text: Bára Skaale Klakstein (née Skaale; born 24 March 1973) is a Faroese footballer who plays as a defender. She has been a member of the Faroe Islands women's national team. She is the mother of fellow Faroe Islands international player Eyðvør Klakstein and they played together in the senior national team in 2013. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Faroese women's footballers Category:Faroe Islands women's international footballers
title: Bára Klakstein
